subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: This week’s World Cup ski races at the famous Hahnenkamm course in Kitzbühel, Austria, were reduced to two slaloms, two days after the International Ski Federation gave the go-ahead to all four planned men’s events.
snippet: This week’s World Cup ski races at the famous Hahnenkamm course in Kitzbühel, Austria, were reduced to two slaloms, two days after the International Ski Federation gave the go-ahead to all four planned men’s events.
